scripts.build: wp-scripts build src/blocks/calendar-button/index.js src/blocks/calendar-button/frontend.js --output-path=build --output-filename=[name].js && cp src/blocks/calendar-button/style.css build/blocks/calendar-button/ && npm run build:i18n
scripts.build:i18n: cp -r languages build/ && npm run compile-po
scripts.compile-po: cd languages && for file in *.po; do msgfmt "$file" -o "${file%.po}.mo"; done
scripts.update-translations: npm run makepot && npm run compile-po
